trigger_prototype.name: HP controller battery_capacitor_status on {HOST.HOST} not OK
HP controller cache_status on {HOST.HOST} is not OK

discovery_rule.name: hparray_logicaldrive_discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovers logical drives in HP controller

trigger_prototype.name: HPACU logical drive status on {HOST.HOST} is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

discovery_rule.name: hparray_physicaldrive_discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovers physical drives in HP controller

trigger_prototype.name: HPACU physical drive {#HPACUPHYID} current_temperature_c on {HOST.HOST} is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
HPACU physical drive {#HPACUPHYID} status on {HOST.HOST} is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
